name: PahlConsulting, Lda
goal:
PahlConsulting is a consultancy organnization that aims to help its customers to improve their strategy & operations.

The speed of business transformation in a globalized world requires quick responses that bring lasting value, allowing organizations to remain competitive.

Our commitment is to build with our customers the solutions that best meet their needs for future utility.
interests: Banking and financial services, Business and Industry, Climate Action, Competition, Digital economy and society, Environment, Fraud prevention, International co-operation and development
customers: Instituto de Gestão Financeira do Ministério da Educação,Secretaria Geral do Ministério da educação,Banco Mundial -Cabo Verde
